meanings.definition: Covered in or consisting of crumbs
meanings.sent1: The crumby tablecloth was a mess after the kids finished eating cookies.
meanings.sent2: I had to clean up the crumby kitchen counter after making sandwiches.
meanings.sent3: The crumby trail of breadcrumbs led straight to the mischievous squirrel's hiding spot.
meanings.sent4: Her crumby sweater was a mosaic of cookie remnants and bread crumbs.
meanings.sent5: The crumby floor crackled underfoot as I walked through the kitchen.

meanings.sent1: The crumby movie we watched last night had terrible acting.
meanings.sent2: I regret buying that crumby old phone; it keeps freezing.
meanings.sent3: The crumby weather ruined our plans for a picnic in the park.
meanings.sent4: The crumby hotel room had a musty smell and stained sheets.
meanings.sent5: The crumby taste of the expired milk made me gag.

meanings.definition: Feeling or appearing dirty or untidy
meanings.sent1: After playing outside, the kids came in with crumby hands and faces.
meanings.sent2: She felt crumby after working in the garden all day.
meanings.sent3: The crumby appearance of the old shed made it seem haunted.
meanings.sent4: His crumby clothes were a result of a day spent painting the fence.
meanings.sent5: The crumby mirror reflected her tired and dusty reflection.
